website_summaries.verdict: Choose them if you prefer a unique, contemporary look; otherwise consider other styles we reviewed.
pros: A trendy style with round lenses and tortoise shell-look frames
They have a small, lightweight design
cons: Some consumers didn't find the reflective lenses appealing
The style is also not for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Not what you’d expect from Ray Ban
customer_reviews.text: The quality on these are what you’d expect from a $15-$20 pair of sunglasses, not what I remember from real Ray Bans. I was going to get a prescription lenses put in them but I’d be afraid they’d break. I expected more from Ray Ban.
customer_reviews.author: Michele S.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China horrible quality way way to large perfect if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Made in China horrible quality way way to large perfect if you are 7 feet tall and have a head the size of a watermelon . Terribly Disappointed !!
customer_reviews.author: GWC1215

customer_reviews.title: Ray Bans for Royalty
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing all types of sunglasses for decades. My brother was selling high end sunglasses in the 1980's and I fell in love with Ray Bans. I have three pair of Ray-Bans now and this pair I think is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Very Ray-Ban in every way !
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. Distinctive. Received promptly and exactly as advertised. I have already changed out the lenses for my prescription without any hassle. Excellent frames, deep color, feel sturdy and very Ray-Ban. They are light weight and a comfort to wear.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Look just like photo
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality Ray bans, I'm a guy, 5'10" with slim face, they fit great, snug, won't fall off, look like quality. I've always worn Ray bans, usually Cats or other plastic framed aviators, thought I'd try something different. Love the gold on frame and gold mirror lens.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mullins

customer_reviews.title: The product is identical to as described. It has really been useful to me and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The product is identical to as described. It has really been useful to me and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, but the ear pieces are too short for a man. So It was to late for me because I was not smart enough to see the unisex description, which should have told me something! If you are a woman fine, but beware gentlemen.
customer_reviews.author: Philip S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. The only thing better, polarized. They fit perfectly and are not loose like the more common Ray Bans. Will purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Melo

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Since I got themI did not take them off. Very light in weight. Very comfortable. Classical style with a modern twist of reflective glass. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: fox

customer_reviews.title: SUPER small for the face
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are SO small and hurt my head/temples. Look horrible on me. And I don't have a big head. Very low quality too. Definitely not what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dauhgter in law and was very impressed with the quality. So much so that I bought myself a pair.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these I ordered a pair and I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these I ordered a pair and I got they sunglasses which were different to what I ordered. The bar at the top was supposed to be metal gold but instead it is plastic which is blue the lenses were supposed to be rose gold but they are purple

customer_reviews.title: Fake Ray Ban
customer_reviews.text: Product description say, this are made in Italy, product received are made in china.

customer_reviews.title: amazing price. perfect product description. reliable seller. brand new items in box with tags.
customer_reviews.text: fast delivery. brand new as advertised. in box. in wrapper. even came with a geuine leather rayban case. real deal. not even rayban.com gives you a case with the glasses. definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: The glasses were identical and a much better price.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped very fast and the glasses are wonderful! Got many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal product and delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Saw them in the mall and really liked them but hadn't made a decision. My sister talked me into ordering them on-line through Amazon Smile. We ordered and got same day delivery. I'm a long-haul trucker and was only in town for the day so it was phenomenal! I love the glasses!

customer_reviews.title: FAKE RAY-BAN GLASSES

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and price but the description is wrong
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and price but the description is wrong, it read 46mm but came 49mm. Just too large for my face. Amazon did, as always, make returning them very easy, so they get an extra star.

customer_reviews.text: UPDATE These sunglasses keep coming apart from the top gold frame. I put them back together and they come apart again. I am very disappointed because now they are all scratched from all the times they have fallen when they come apart. The return window has passed so I can no longer return these defective glasses. Bummer.

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Rb4256 Round Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Evolving an original shape with softer lines, luminous tones and contrasting finishes, Ray-Ban introduces a fresh take on the iconic wayfarer to reveal the unique personality of DNA Ray-Ban style. The evolution of the Wayfarer ensures that authentic style is always as contemporary and functional as it is iconic. Squared unisex shape with lightweight nylon fibre rims, a coined metal bridge and thin, matte coloured metal temples paired with new flat gradient mirror lenses offer a daring take on icon-inspired style, while classic G-15 and B-15 options provide a more iconic look.
feature_bullets: This is a stylish combination of modern and classic colors. With high brow detaining and top quality lenses.
This is a stylish combination of modern and classic colors. With high brow detaining and top quality lenses.
